Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class Door

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Door
public class Door extends Object
Represents a door in the maze that can be opened when specific conditions are met. The door serves as an exit point and requires both a key and at least one rescued friend to open.

    • Door

      public Door(float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Constructs a Door object with the specified position and size.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the door
      y - the y-coordinate of the door
      width - the width of the door
      height - the height of the door

  • Method Details

    • isPlayerNearby

      public boolean isPlayerNearby(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 playerPosition)
      Checks if the player is near the door based on their position.
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - the position of the player
      Returns:
      true if the player is near the door, false otherwise

    • tryToOpen

      public void tryToOpen(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 playerPosition, HUD hud, MazeRunnerGame game, Friends friends)
      Attempts to open the door if the player meets the necessary conditions. The player must be near the door, have collected the key, and have at least one saved friend. If the conditions are met, the level is completed. Otherwise, a HUD message is displayed.
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - the position of the player
      hud - the HUD instance managing game information
      game - the current instance of the MazeRunnerGame
      friends - the Friends instance containing information about saved friends

    • getPosition

      public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getPosition()
      Gets the position of the door. A copy of the position is returned to prevent external modification.
      Returns:
      a copy of the door's position as a Vector2
